Missing parameter in calculate_neutrality when called from main design
loop

1) Fixed a bug splitting list (mistaken for a string)

2) Fixed code block in README

3) change version in setup

1) Moved to the built in argument parser instead of my ugly custom one

2) Changed IUPAC aligner to get an object with functions for scoring
purposes instead of constant numbers.

3) Added a sequence motif feature. Forces high penalty for deletion or
insertions within a sequence motifs. Those are marked with lower case
sequence constraints.

4) Added a feature to remove penalty for insertion or removal of bulges
and internal loops smaller then a given size. This isn't ideal since if
we compare a stem to stem separated by a small buldge we still get a
(Stem (bulge (Stem (...))) vs (Stem (...)) comparison. The stem in the
second tree will be matched to one of the stems of the first tree
leaving the penalty for the other intact. For this reason the feature
will not be applied to the web-server.

5) Added gui options for generating image of a result and exporting as
tab separated values file.

6) varna location file is now set by config file

7) README is updated to new argument format and includes better
instruction for running the GUI client

8) Version was set to 2.0
Added script for matching index pulling
Revert change
Increase version number for deployment of new index feature
Small bug with misuse of IUIPAC.common_dna_code. returns list not string

1) is valid sequence now has a wildcard mode
2) some more typing annotations
3) mutation now changes / adds / removes up to 5 bases.
5/15 for 1, 4/15 for 2, 3/15 for 3, 2/15 for 4 and 1/15 for 5
4) Now works same as RNAfbinv V1 for initiation (vienna)
5) VARNA generator now supports secondary mark and format options
6) Alignment data now doesn't have an extra unnecessary list around the tuple.
7) Added a method to retrieve indexes from alignment (source indexes).
current implementation (no mismatches, just removal) mismatch should stay empty
Fixed small bug in GUI adding \n to starting sequence

1) Added shapiro structure to the ListMotif application
2) Added debug messages in lineRNAfold and argument function
3) Vienna now always gives initial sequence (based on target sequence AGCU only by using lowercase and random \ seed as uppercase)
This allows it to keep lowercase as unchangable and uppercase as changable.
This means inverse_seq_ready merges target and start sequences.
4) Vienna Live RNAfold now uses another thread to read. This was added to avoid deadlock when pipe is full

fixed typing annotation

Re-organization. Separating GUI from package.
Minor fixes

Fixed tree alignment algorithm ignoring tree hierarchy
The optimum for the dynamic programming function is:

OPT(T1, T2) = minmax_func(A, B, C)
A = cmp_func(T1.value, T2.value) + minmax_func(D(T1.children, T2.children))
B = del_func(T1.value) + minmax_func(D(T1.children, T2))
C = del_func(T2.value) + minmax_func(D(T1, T2.children))
D = sum of costs for each child match combination with order.
    Children not matched are counted as deleted

1) reorganization in preparation for package

Working version of RNAsfbinv.

1) Added target energy and mutational robustness to score
2) Added a result printing
3) Now reading energy information from RNAfold
4) fixed an issue with unexpected spaces in RNAfold output
5) Added value alignment data for tree alignment, specifically in
shapiro tree's we add the sequence alignment
6) changed output from -o to -l and --verbose / --debug modes
and misc bugs
Added git ignore, removed some unrelevant comments

1) Tree aligner now supports searching for either minimum score or maximum score
2) Shapiro tree aligner now attempts to minimize function (0 is perfect score) like in the original RNAfbinv
3) Fixed bug in IUPAC sequence aligner where it would backtrack the wrong sequence
Tree aligner is now iterative. HUGE performance increase

Fixed tree alignment algorithm to support both negative and positive values
This version values are more accurate in small difference

Performance issue. need to move to iterative version and add memorization.

Initial code for the new python version of RNAfbinv

This version will:
